sect1.title: Master Changelog
sect1.para: This is version &version; of the Cross-Compiled Linux From Scratch book, dated &releasedate;. If this book is more than six months old, a newer and better version is probably already available. To find out, please check one of the mirrors via .
Below is a list of detailed changes made since the previous release of the book.

listitem.para: [jciccone] - Updated the EGlibc fixes patch to -2.
[jciccone] - Updated the Vim Branch Update Patch to -19.
[jciccone] - Updated the Ncurses Branch Update Patch to -18.
[jciccone] - Updated the Bash Branch Update Patch to -6.
[jciccone] - Use Util-Linux-NG for libuuid and libblkid instead of E2fsprogs.
[jciccone] - Updated Bash Branch Update Patch to -5.
[jciccone] - Moved DHCPCD to the Network section.
[jciccone] - Add CLooG and PPL for GCC, Based on Winkie's work in the main branch.
[jciccone] - Updated the Binutils Branch Update patch to -5.
[jciccone] - Updated the MPFR Branch Update patch to -2.
[jciccone] - Updated the Vim Branch Update patch to -15.
[jciccone] - Updated the NCurses Branch Update Patch to -14.
[jciccone] - UUCP group no longer needed by udev.
[jciccone] - Created a new Perl Cross Compile patch for Perl 5.10.0.
[jciccone] - Updated Glibc Cross Hacks Patch to -2.
[jciccone] - Applied Patch to Sysvinit. Fixed Various Issues.
[jciccone] - Moved location of dumpkeys to /bin. Required by bootscripts.
[jciccone] - Removed redundant acknowlegements page in appendices.
[jciccone] - Added Arch to Util-Linux-NG. Updated descriptions of configure parameters.
[jciccone] - Added New Compressors patches to File, Man, Texinfo, Tar.
[jciccone] - Add Man Pages patch to Module-Init-Tools.
[jciccone] - Added DHCPCD to the final system.
[jciccone] - Updated NCurses Branch Update Patch to -10.
[jciccone] - Diffutils wants ed as a editor. Changed it to Vim.
[jciccone] - Updated VIM Branch Update patch to -11.
[jciccone] - Updated MPFR to 2.4.1 and added branch update patch.
[jciccone] - Ported the NCurses widec builds from trunk and added the branch update patch.
[jciccone] - Added command to make Perl use system-installed Zlib. Fixes ticket #201.
[jciccone] - Add the Binutils Branch Update -4 Patch.
[jciccone] - Change hard-links to relative-links in bzip2.
[jciccone] - Updated Udev to 137. Fixed nagging uucp group issue for udev.
[jciccone] - Add the VIM Branch Update -5 Patch.
[jciccone] - Add the Tar Revert Pipe Drain patch and the Tar Man Page patch.
[jciccone] - Added patch that will fix a build issue with Kbd. The patch is for the linux-headers in final-system.
[jciccone] - Removed the vim cross-compile patch. It has been sufficiently fixed upstream that so that config.cache entries are enough.
[jciccone] - Various Compilation fixes for the entire book.
[jciccone] - Convert from the old depreciated kernel headers tarball to the headers included with the kernel.
[Jonathan] - Corrected a typo in the changelog.
[jciccone] - Updated the Bash fixes patch to -7.
[jciccone] - Create entities for each UID and GID and reference those entities throught the book instead of using user names and group names.
[jciccone] - Build a PIC libfl.a with flex.
[jciccone] - Updated Udev to 115. This change also removed the udev-cross-lfs package since our rules are the same as the ones installed.
[jciccone] - Updated Linux to 2.6.22.6 and Linux Headers to 2.6.22.6-09032007.
[jciccone] - Updated Shadow Patch for more fixes. Man Page Typos , buffer overflows, useradd -G fixes, better name support, and the previous useradd fix.
[jciccone] - Pointed Inetutils to the Ncurses headers in $CLFS.
[jciccone] - Updated the download location for the Man Pages package.
[jciccone] - Updated Gzip's list of installed programs.
[jciccone] - Added a patch to the Perl build that fixes an issue with recent snapshots of gcc-4.2.0.
[jciccone] - Changed the wording in the "Build Variables" page to make it clearer. Copied from Chris's change in clfs-svn.
[jciccone] - Fix the building of Ncurses when an unpatched version of Bash 3.x is used.
[jciccone] - Added a command to remove the rules that Udev installs by default.
[jciccone] - Updated the Perl Cross-compile patch to support Alpha.
[jciccone] - Updated the Glibc Branch Update patch to -3.
[jciccone] - Updated the Binutils Branch Update Patch.
[jciccone] - Updated the Glibc Branch Update Patch.
[Chris] - Removed redundant command to copy libiberty.h to ${CLFS}/usr/include a second time.
[jciccone] - Removed MINOR patch and replaced it with a more complete upstream patch will all current updates to the 2.5 branch of Glibc.
[jciccone] - Updated the Glibc cross_hacks patch to -2. The new version prevents CFLAGS from being used when compiling a native tool.
[Chris] - Removed obsolete command from man instructions as the problem it addresses was fixed in the latest man version).

[jciccone] - Added a native compile of Shadow. The native utilities are configured to work with the target system. The password and group files can now be shadowed and the root password can be set before booting into the system.
[jciccone] - Replace the glibc crosscompile timezone fix patch with the glibc cross hacks patch. The new patch has support for zoneinfo, locales, and librpcsvc.
[jciccone] - Update the Glibc libgcc_eh patch to -2. The new version checks to see if libgcc_eh exists and if it does Glibc will link against it.
[jciccone] - Updated Linux to 2.6.18.3 and Linux Headers to 2.6.18.3-11202006.
[jciccone] - Bash 3.2 patch updated with upstream fixes 001-005.
[jciccone] - Added a patch to fix a versioning issue with Glibc 2.5.
[jciccone] - Modified the instructions for disabling the installation of the groups program to account for changes in shadow's Makefile.
[jciccone] - Bash 3.2 patch updated with upstream fixes.
[jciccone] - Removed out of place udev text in bootscripts Networking.
[jciccone] - Added command to man instructions to comment out MANPATH /usr/local/man (in addition to /usr/man).
[jciccone] - Updated Bash 3.2 with some unofficial upstream fixes. Thank you Chet Ramey.
[jciccone] - Updated the udev rules tarball to 1.1-09062006.
[jciccone] - Updated the vim fixes patch to -14.
[jciccone] - Added patch to fix build issues with Bash 3.2.
[jciccone] - New patch for util-linux, replaces GCC 4 fixes. The new patch fixes the same issues, and removes the use of syscalls. Syscalls were removed from unistd.h during sanitation.
[jciccone] - Added a patch to Util-Linux to fix build issues due to changes in the kernel.
[jciccone] - Updated Bootscripts to 1.1-pre1. Adding in the boot logging feature.
[jciccone] - Removed TeX installation commands from Texinfo instructions.
[manuel] - Changed book license to the Open Publication License v1.0.
[jciccone] - Added a Host System Requirements page.
[jciccone] - Updated to Vim Patch -12, which contains upstream fixes. This patch will be upgraded weekly, no further changelog entries needed.
[jciccone] - Add patch to fix gzexe. Used Matts change from LFS, that utilizes Robert's fix. More details at http://wiki.linuxfromscratch.org/lfs/ticket/1876.

[jciccone] - Added a patch to fix Inetutils. Telnet on 64 bit systems will fail, it will attempt to connect to 255.255.255.255 instead of the ip address entered. This was due to a change in glibc's handling of inet_addr, was long now is u_int32_t. Bug found by Vladimir Vainer.
[jciccone] - Updated Linux to 2.6.17.13 and Linux Headers to 2.6.17.13-09092006.
[jciccone] - Replaced the Perl -fPIC patch with a sed.
[jciccone] - Removed the keymap settings from the kernel pages.
[jciccone] - Added Shadow patch to fix useradd.
[jciccone] - Updated to Coreutils Uname Patch -2, which supports all architectures.
[jciccone] - Updated to Vim Patch -10, which contains upstream fixes.
[jciccone] - Updated to Udev 098 and udev-cross-lfs to 1.1-08272006 rules.
[jciccone] - Updated to Linux-2.6.17.11 and Linux-Headers to 2.6.17.11-08232006.
[jciccone] - Added the Perl fPIC patch which makes perl build a shared DynaLoader.a.
[jciccone] - Removed mention of package users hint from "Package Management" page.
[jciccone] - Moved man-pages to the beginning of the build. (fixes ticket #82).
[jciccone] - Fixed a problem where when bash is cross-compiled it cannot test for the presence of named pipes.
[jciccone] - Fixed symlink issue in bootscripts. New package CLFS-bootscropts 0.3.
[jciccone] - Updated the perl cross-compile patch to -2 to support x86.
[jciccone] - Added TZDIR="${CLFS}/usr/share/zoneinfo" to the tzselect command. This makes sure that the tzselect command looks in zoneinfo dir that was just installed by glibc instead of the host.
[jciccone] - Added groff to cross-tools to satisfy a dependency when cross-compiling it later in the final system.
[jciccone] - Added a sed to fix updatedb due to the new location of find.
[jciccone] - Removed unneeded chown and chmod commands from the linux-headers installation.
[jciccone] - Updated Udev rules to 07062006, Fixed cdrom permissions and groups.
[jciccone] - Fixes a possible issue with bootscripts if the /usr partition is not mounted during startup. Moved find to /bin and moved some kbd utilities to /bin.
[jciccone] - Updated passwd and group file creation to only create minimal users and groups and include information on other users/groups.
[jciccone] - Updated to Cross-LFS Bootscripts. Added check for for /etc/sysconfig/createfiles.
[jciccone] - Added mktemp to the Linux dependency list. New dependency as of 2.6.17.
[jciccone] - Added an iconv_fix patch to glibc which fixes an issue that has shown up primarily in samba.
[jciccone] - Added the glibc crosscompile_timezone-fix to glibc which installs timezone info when cross-compiling.
[jciccone] - Updated the list of installed programs for several packages.
[jciccone] - Fixed the module-init-tools install in the presence of existing files.
[jciccone] - Updated to linux-2.6.16.20, linux-headers-2.6.16.20-06052006, and Bison-2.3.
[jciccone] - Added a patch to fix a missing declaration of R_OK in util-linux.
[jciccone] - Updated to e2fsprogs-1.39, man-pages-2.33, and linux-headers-2.6.16.19-06042006.
[jciccone] - Updated to linux-headers-05292006, udev-093, and binutils-2.16.93.
[jciccone] - Created the clfs-2.0 branch. Resetting all Changelogs.

sect1.para: Branch Synced from cross-lfs-1.0 on May 24th, 2006
